name: Overgrow
description: Increases the power of Grass-type moves

name: Chlorophyll
description: Doubles the ability-bearer's Speed

name: Blaze
description: Increases the power of Fire-type moves

name: Solar Power
description: Special Attack stat is increased

name: Torrent
description: Increases the power of Water-type moves

name: Rain Dish
description: Heals HP in rain

name: Static
description: May cause paralysis if target uses a contact move

name: Lightning Rod
description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to boost its Special Attack stat

name: Cute Charm
description: May cause infatuation if target uses a contact move

name: Competitive
description: Raises Special Attack by two stages when a stat is lowered

name: Pickup
description: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle

name: Technician
description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves

name: Rock Head
description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage

name: Sturdy
description: The Pokémon is unaffected by One Hit Knock Out moves and in Generation V, the Pokémon cannot be knocked out when it has full Hit Points

name: Swift Swim
description: Doubles Speed during rain

name: Rattled
description: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a Bug-, Ghost-, or Dark-type move

name: Run Away
description: Enables sure getaway from wild Pokémon

name: Adaptability
description: Powers up moves of the same type

name: Immunity
description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned

name: Thick Fat
description: Halves damage from Fire- and Ice-type moves
